attributes.action: INTRODUCE ROAD TAX AND INSURANCE FOR CYCLISTS
attributes.additional_details: the way the new rules of the highway code are will cause more accidents / deaths on our roads.
attributes.background: As cyclists now have priority over cars on the roads we the public feel they must now pay road tax and insurance like car drivers have to

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
